name: The Kalian Huntress
description:
The Kalian Huntress is a science fiction adventure game made as a dissertation project at Griffith College Dublin. It follows the adventure of a bounty hunter after the end of a galactic civil war.

The game is developed by a team of three people:

- Emilie Fort
- Robert Chukwunonso Iyitor
- Charles Ravel aka Xorl Rowel
